title: Daily Routines
content:
# Daily Routines in Spanish

## Common Activities
- despertarse - to wake up
- ducharse - to shower
- desayunar - to have breakfast
- trabajar - to work
- almorzar - to have lunch
- cenar - to have dinner
- acostarse - to go to bed

## Practice Exercises
1. Describe your daily routine
2. Tell time in Spanish
3. Use reflexive verbs correctly

sentences.sentence: Me despierto a las siete de la mañana.
sentences.translation: I wake up at seven in the morning.
I work from nine to five.

sentences.sentence: Almuerzo con mis amigos al mediodía.
sentences.translation: I have lunch with my friends at noon.

sentences.sentence: Ceno a las siete de la noche.
sentences.translation: I have dinner at seven in the evening.

sentences.sentence: Me acuesto a las diez de la noche.
sentences.translation: I go to bed at ten at night.

fill_blank: To jest kontynuacja. Zdanie po odpowiedzi.

title: Food and Dining
content:
# Food and Dining Vocabulary

## Food Categories
- el desayuno - breakfast
- el almuerzo - lunch
- la cena - dinner
- las bebidas - drinks
- los postres - desserts

## Common Phrases
- Tengo hambre - I'm hungry
- Tengo sed - I'm thirsty
- ¡Buen provecho! - Enjoy your meal!

## Practice Exercises
1. Order food at a restaurant
2. Describe your favorite meals
3. Learn food-related vocabulary

title: Hobbies and Free Time
content:
# Hobbies and Free Time Activities

## Common Activities
- leer - to read
- ver la televisión - to watch TV
- escuchar música - to listen to music
- jugar al fútbol - to play soccer
- nadar - to swim

## Practice Exercises
1. Talk about your hobbies
2. Plan weekend activities
3. Express preferences (me gusta/no me gusta)
